english.segment1: I lay in a bed of resistance. Chained to either side. I really wish I could reset rewind. Someone has clawed out my eyes. Can't identify. I really wish I could reset rewind. You know it's never the way we planned it. I really wish we could reset rewind.
english.segment2: I'm planning a revolution inside my head!. I'm planning a revolution when I break free. I call for annihilation. Describe the sunlight so I can feel it's burn. If only I could get up from this bed
english.segment3: I don't know what they told you. But this place is not what you think. Reset Rewind!
english.segment4: Living inside a hole they put me underground. Where they can never find me 'less they dig me out.
english.segment5: I search for the answers 'cause this is the end. I search for the answers!
english.segment6: God! It's caving in on me!. I feel them watching!. But no one seems to care anymore!. I'm digging, I'm digging my way out. 'Cause when I breathe in there is no release!
english.segment7: I can't believe this, I can't believe this. My mind is starting to turn on me!
english.segment8: I've been living inside a hole they put me underground. Where they could never find me 'less they dig me out. I've been living inside a hole. Where they could never find me 'less they dig me out.
